archimate:BusinessEvent.name: G&V Suspension Condition
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation: Temporary Suspension Conditions​ 4. Banking systems (e.g. due to revoked SDD, insolvency,...)​ 5. Warrant expiration, either communicated by the broker via email or automatically detected by SAP​ 6. Retailer request via certified email (PEC)​ 7. IGT Internal Requests (e.g. for checks,...), communicated via email
